001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model;
002
003import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
004import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
005import java.util.Objects;
006
007/**
008 * Encapsulates the data elements and logic for ships in local data store.
009 */
010public class Ship {
011
012  @Expose
013  private int x;
014
015  @Expose
016  private int y;
017
018  @Expose
019  private final int length;
020
021  @Expose
022  private boolean vertical;
023
024  private boolean selected;
025
026  /**
027   * Initializes final fields in absence of Gson initialization.
028   *
029   * @param x        The x value of the ship coordinate.
030   * @param y        The y value of the ship coordinate.
031   * @param length   The length of a ship, and also the number of hits it can take.
032   * @param vertical The boolean flag indicating the orientation of the ship on the board.
033   */
034  public Ship(int x, int y, int length, boolean vertical) {
035    this.x = x;
036    this.y = y;
037    this.length = length;
038    this.vertical = vertical;
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Initiates the final fields in this class.
043   *
044   * @param length Indicates the length of a particular {@link Ship}. This also indicates the total
045   *               number of hits the {@code ship} can take, and the type of {@code ship} it is as
046   *               well (Trireme vs Galley vs Canoe; basically flavor text).
047   */
048  public Ship(int length) {
049    this.length = length;
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Gets the X coordinate of a {@code ship} on a board for other methods to access. {@code x} makes
054   * up half of a ship location on the board.
055   */
056  public int getX() {
057    return x;
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Sets the X coordinate of a {@code ship} on a board for other methods to access. {@code x} makes
062   * up half of a ship location on the board.
063   *
064   * @param x The X coordinate of a {@code ship} on a board.
065   */
066  public void setX(int x) {
067    this.x = x;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Gets the Y coordinate of a {@code ship} on a board for other methods to access. {@code y} makes
072   * up half of a ship location on the board.
073   */
074  public int getY() {
075    return y;
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Sets the Y coordinate of a {@code ship} on a board for other methods to access. This makes up
080   * half of a ship location on the board.
081   *
082   * @param y Y coordinate of a {@code ship} on a board.
083   */
084  public void setY(int y) {
085    this.y = y;
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Gets {@code length}. The {@code length} is how many points on a board that a {@code ship}
090   * occupies on a board. It also indicates how many hits a ship can take and what type of
091   * {@code ship} it is.
092   */
093  public int getLength() {
094    return length;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Gets {@code Vertical}. {@code Vertical} is a boolean flag indicating if a ship has been
099   * oriented vertically or horizontally on the board.
100   */
101  public boolean isVertical() {
102    return vertical;
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Sets {@code Vertical} for other methods to access.
107   *
108   * @param vertical This is a boolean flag indicating if a ship has been oriented vertically or
109   *                 horizontally on the board.
110   */
111  public void setVertical(boolean vertical) {
112    this.vertical = vertical;
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Gets {@code selected}. {@code selected} is a boolean flag indicating if a ship has been
117   * selected in the UI.
118   */
119  public boolean isSelected() {
120    return selected;
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Sets {@code selected} for other methods to access.
125   *
126   * @param selected This is a boolean flag indicating if a ship has been selected in the UI.
127   */
128  public void setSelected(boolean selected) {
129    this.selected = selected;
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Calculates if a ship includes a particular point on the board
134   *
135   * @param gridX The X coordinate of a point on the board's grid.
136   * @param gridY The Y coordinate of a point on the board's grid.
137   * @return includesPoint This is a boolean flag indicating whether a ship includes a point on the
138   * board.
139   */
140  public boolean includesPoint(int gridX, int gridY) {
141    return vertical
142        ? x == gridX && gridY >= y && gridY < y + length
143        : y == gridY && gridX >= x && gridX < x + length;
144  }
145
146  @Override
147  public int hashCode() {
148    return Objects.hash(x, y, length, vertical);
149  }
150
151  @Override
152  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
153    boolean equals;
154    if (obj == this) {
155      equals = true;
156    } else if (obj instanceof Ship other) {
157      equals = this.x == other.x
158          && this.y == other.y
159          && this.length == other.length
160          && this.vertical == other.vertical;
161    } else {
162      equals = false;
163    }
164    return equals;
165  }
166}
167
168
